name: Romulus
character_description: On the king's orders, Proxemo - the owner of the arena in Gladiator's Bay - slaughtered the inhabitants of the village where Romulus lived. Everyone including him resisted the attackers, but they decided to capture him because he looked strong. He is not reconciled to his predicament, and wants revenge - on Proxemo and then on the king. He is confident, sometimes arrogant. Sometimes he gets out of control and explodes.

name: Kaly
character_description: Brother of the current King Rezenhart, to whom the throne is due. He is conspiring to prepare a rebellion against the king. He deems Romulus capable of winning championships in all arenas, which in theory will allow him to challenge Rezenhart to a duel. He controls himself, acting like a spy.

name: Rezenhart
character_description: Cunning, perspicacious, can weigh words. He pretends to be interested in other people. Beneath the elegy hides an unscrupulousness.

name: Proxemo
character_description: Owner of the Gladiator Bay arena. He is a buffoon, he doesn't care about people, he only cares about money. He is impulsive, although he can control himself when money is involved. As Romulus advances, he would most like to kill him because he gets on his nerves.

name: Elder
character_description: Owner of an arena in the village of Gallen. He is old, but he still cares about money. He stopped running the farm because it was no longer profitable; he took to running the arena. He is resolute. He counts with others. He's hiding something.

name: Lord Tameron
character_description: Owner of an arena in Rainwood Forest. Pretends to be a nobleman. Speaks in a measured manner. Takes pride in his arena.

name: Recker
character_description: Captain of the Guards, he is currently stationed in Rainwood Forest. He is disciplined, though remains human at the same time. He is relatively easy to annoy, although he appreciates people. He does not exalt himself.

name: Governor
character_description: Distinguished. Respects Romulus, although he is more proud of his arena.

name: Warden
character_description: Head of the guard at the prison. Suspicious. He gets annoyed when someone does not behave in his way. He thinks his subordinates are stupid.

name: Arena manager
character_description: Initially, he mocks Romulus. He is responsible for allowing gladiators into the arena.

name: Arena manager
character_description: He doesn't give a damn about the fate of the gladiators, although he has an appreciation for the winners.

name: Arena manager
character_description: Relaxed, rather friendly in conversation.

name: Arena manager
character_description: The appearance of Romulus is an honour for him. He is meticulous, yet caught up in the excitement.

name: Flamma
character_description: The arena champion from Labos, who fights Romulus in a showpiece duel. Confident. He despises the spectators, but not Romulus.

name: Herold
character_description: He announces what will be happening in the Gladiator Bay arena.

name: Judge
character_description: Explains the rules of combat in the training arena. Relaxed.

name: Igor
character_description: An observer on a platform that could collapse. He works with the constant threat of losing his life - until Romulus helps him.

name: Caradas
character_description: Exhausted by torture. In prison he speaks in a hushed voice.

name: Kamil
character_description: He tries not to make others uncomfortable.

name: Carpet maker
character_description: He is proud of and sensitive to his range of carpets.

name: Pepper
character_description: Childish. He extorts an autograph from Romulus.

name: Crazy old man
character_description: He saw Romulus kill a gladiator in the arena and wants to avenge him.

name: Tragor
character_description: A good reference to Varion movies. He would have two characters talking one after the other with Romulus. Robert's pal.

name: Robert
character_description: A good reference to Varion movies. He would have two characters talking one after the other with Romulus. He is depressed. Dumbfounded.

name: Kurier
character_description: Courier company employee. Always in a hurry, always on time.

name: Dobosh
character_description: He utters paraphrases from the Canadian series 'Trailer Park'.

name: Prisoner
character_description: Crazy. He takes his rat seriously.

name: Fisherman
character_description: Drinker. When sober, he fishes. Until Romulus steals his boat.

name: Architect
character_description: Absorbed in his work.

name: Hermes
character_description: The boss of the Gladiator Bay arena. He has tattoos and looks like a monster. With the successive victories of Romulus, it is beginning to reckon with him. He has an axe with which he knocks back opponents. He only speaks out just before the fight with Romulus.

name: Izyrion
character_description: Boss of the arena in the village of Gallen. Initially, he hustles an unassuming old man to help Romulus join the tournament. Already in the arena, he behaves like an old samurai.

name: Robin
character_description: The boss of the Rainwood Forest arena. He has gentle facial features and bases his success on agility and bow fighting.

name: Roland
character_description: The boss of the arena in the town of Randale. A Templar who became a slave in the arena. With a strange sense of mission. He behaves in a dignified manner. He is dressed in knightly armour with a cloak.

name: Enforcer
character_description: He appears when Romulus is late for a fight. And announces to him that he will carry out the death penalty.

name: Prisoner
character_description: Kind, old prisoner

name: Prisoner
character_description: rude

name: Prisoner
character_description: confident

name: Slave
character_description: Slave being led into a cave with Romulus

name: Slave
character_description: Slave being led into a cave with Romulus

name: Slave
character_description: Slave being led into a cave with Romulus

name: Garg
character_description: A donkey from the village of Gallen.

name: Sentry
character_description: He tells Romulus to go to the governor.

name: Gardener
character_description: He lost his gnomes.

name: Gilermo
character_description: He looks forward to seeing the gladiators enlisted.

name: Night guard
character_description: Easily irritated. Malicious.

name: Engineer
character_description: Boulder launcher operator during a manhunt for bandits.

name: Scout
character_description: Young, a bit silly, ambitious.

name: Lumberjack
character_description: All that matters to him is the money and the position he has lost due to losing bets in the arena.

name: Apprentice
name_extended: Apprentice of hunter from Gladiators Bay

name: Prison guard
name_extended: Prison guard on the path to executioner

name: Captain
name_extended: Captain of a ship in the bay

name: Spiker
character_description: He announces the fight in the arena.

name: Prison guard
character_description: React when Romulus stands by them for too long.

name: Prison guard
character_description: React when Romulus stands by them for too long.

name: Prison guard
character_description: React when Romulus stands by them for too long.

name: Prison guard
character_description: React when Romulus stands by them for too long.

name: Prison guard
character_description: React when Romulus stands by them for too long.

name: Trainer
name_extended: Trainer from training arena on Gladiators Bay

name: Warrior
name_extended: Warrior by the platform in the bay

name: Warrior
name_extended: Warrior at the platform in the forest

name: Knight
name_extended: Knight by the platform in the city
